tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE HadoopData (id INT, data VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE SQLData (id INT, data VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE IntegrationData (id INT, sql_id INT, hadoop_id INT, date_created DATE);
CREATE TABLE TransformationData (id INT, integration_id INT, transformed_data VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE ProcessingData (id INT, transformation_id INT, processing_type VARCHAR(50), result VARCHAR(255));
